```json
{
  "selected_paths": [
    "/about",
    "/careers",
    "/blog",
    "/changelog",
    "/customers",
    "/features",
    "/integrations",
    "/method",
    "/pricing",
    "/press",
    "/startups"
  ],
  "path_explanations": {
    "/about": "Provides company description, founding year, value proposition, and company size.",
    "/careers": "Indicates employee count, job listings, and company culture.",
    "/blog": "Contains company updates, product developments, and industry insights.",
    "/changelog": "Details product updates, feature releases, and bug fixes.",
    "/customers": "Showcases notable clients and success stories, indicating market reach and reputation.",
    "/features": "Describes products/services offered, highlighting competitive advantages and tech stack.",
    "/integrations": "Lists third-party tools and services integrated with the company's platform.",
    "/method": "Explains the company's approach to product development and business operations.",
    "/pricing": "Provides information on pricing plans, indicating business model and target market.",
    "/press": "Includes recent news, events, awards, and funding status.",
    "/startups": "Offers resources and guidance for startups, reflecting the company's engagement with the startup ecosystem."
  }
}
```
